about.aboutUsDesc:
Wholesale catalog is your global online shopping destination specializing in women's ethnic wear. Download the app Today & buy our latest Catalogs collections in sarees, lehengas, salwar suits, kurtis, palazzo, western tops, kids wear, gowns & much more at your fingertips. Wholesale Catalog app is best for one who are looking for women's online ethnic products at best pricing & quality assurance. You can also buy complete set of catalogs at wholesale standards rates. We offer more than 30,000 products with 500 brands latest fashion trends.

		We strive to provide the best of women's ethnic wear collection. The product you find from Krishna Creation is one of surat top most exporter and suppliers of sarees, lehengas, salwar suits, tunics, kurtis, combo packs, kids wear, plus size clothing, burkhas, abayas, scarves and varied collection of fabrics & other ethnic wear for women.

		Browse the following categories in our app store.

		Sarees-Saree is one such attire that would never go out of fashion. We offer you various sarres such as casual sarees. printed sarees, designer sarres, embroudered word sarees, party wear sarees, wedding sarees, half & half sarees, traditional sarees, bhagalpuri sarees, lehenga sarees, net sarees, bollywood sarees.

		Designer suits & anarkali - when it comes to indian dressing style, anarkali % salwar suit are a favourite among indian women. Chech out Wholesale Calalog salwar suits collection from ankle length anarkalis, bridal anarkalis, designer anarkalis, palazzo suit, straight cut suits, patiala suits, semi stitched suits, indo western suits, party wear suits & readymades.

		Lehengas-another amazing trend in the world of indian fashion screne is a lehenga choli. wedding season will start veery soon, and all brides are searching for stunning designs of lehengas to make her day completely perfect. Lets take a quick look of Wholesale Catalog latest collection of lehengas which comprises of a line lehengas, designer lehengas, bridal lehengas, wedding lehenga & kids lehengas.

		Tunic & Kurtis shop for latest collection of womeni1/2s kirtis & tunic at best quality & best pricing. We offer different types of kurtis & tunics available with different size & styles. Our collection consists of long kurtis, short kurtis, embroidered kurtis, cotton kurtis, party wear kurtis, designer tunic. long tunic, printed tunic.

		Bollywood Collection-The bollywood saree collection are the one been inspired by bollywood celebrities saree which they wear on awards & entertainment shows. Now you can get your favourite celebrity look in this festive season. It is time to think what yout favourite bollywood saree trend is.

		Plus Size-Plus size trend is not about having larger size cloth. It is about creating outfit which gives perfect curvier figure for bigger women in a attractive and stylish manner. View our elegant collection of plus size clothing which will add more cheer in your look.

		Kids wear i1/2 shop for latest collection of kids kurtis, lehengas, gowns, palazzo suits, frocks, & tunic at best quality & best pricing. We offer different types of kurtis & tunics available with different size styles. Our collection consists of kids kurtis, short kurtis, embroidered kurtis, frocks, party wear kurtis, designer tunic, long tunic, printed tunic.

		Download Wholesale Calalog app today and enjoy the online shopping of women apparel's collections at wholesale from your favorite place.

		Wholesale Calalog is an iconic platform reinterpreting and relaunching the traditional indian fashion in a revolutionary way. The daughter company of sanvari fashion. It showcases multiple ladies apparels in various design following the latest trends of fashion. Ranging from western to indian clothing. The collection of our company presents an image of charm and sophistication. We have an adequate supply of dresses which include kurti, Saree, Salwar Kameez, Dress Material, Lehenga Choli, T-Shirt, Top, Pants, and other clothes. Which will help keep your wardrobe complete.
